about.data: NRS Chariot Tech Pvt. Ltd. is an Indian start-up providing end-to -end-to end internet of things (Iot) and M2M solution.We at our inovation lab develop smart IoT based solution bringing substantial optimization in resource management and making our earth a better place to live-in.End-to-end solution include wireless sensor device(hardware) and customized application (software) soltion.Connect anthing  through our products and manage resources like you have never done before.

body.name: NRS Chariot Tech Pvt. Ltd. is an Indian start-up providing end-to -end-to end internet of things (Iot) and M2M solution.We at our inovation lab develop smart IoT based solution bringing substantial optimization in resource management and making our earth a better place to live-in.End-to-end solution include wireless sensor device(hardware) and customized application (software) soltion.Connect anthing  through our products and manage resources like you have never done before.

body.heading: Mission
body.subHead: Creating diversified and simplified solutions using internet of things leading to optimized resource usage.

body.subData: To Craete symbiotic ecosystem between technology and human race making earth a better place to live-in.

head.heading: Nilay Mehrotra
head.subhead: A Serial Entrepreneur and one of the core team member for development of India’s ﬁrst Super Car DC Avanti.He has served as the Asst. V.P. for a Pune based startup Adclever.He has also been a public speaker and a motivator at platforms.He is an Alumni of UPES Dehradun.

head.heading: Raj Garg
head.subhead: A Serial Entrepreneur and one of the core team member for development of India’s ﬁrst Super Car DC Avanti.He has served as the Asst. V.P. for a Pune based startup Adclever.He has also been a public speaker and a motivator at platforms.He is an Alumni of UPES Dehradun.

head.heading: Siddhant Srivastava
head.subhead: A team player,who likes to lead team and deliver results.Working in marketing and management since college days and later worked with India's No. 1 Two-Wheeler Company,Hero Motocorp Ltd. He is an active environmentalist and a HBTI Kanpur alumni.
